{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Cheesemaking {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Cheesemaking Cheesemaking (or caseiculture ) is the craft of making cheese. The production of cheese, like many other food preservation processes, allows the nutritional and economic value of a food material, in this case milk, to be preserved in concentrated form. Cheesemaking allows the production of the cheese with diverse flavors and consistencies. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cheesemaking)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
